title: Secure Pages: HTTP Redirect
name: Drupal-7:SecureHTTPRedirect
description: Ensure secure pages module is configured to force redirect to HTTPS.
remediation: Ensure the whitelisted pages are set to "*". `drush vset securepages_pages '*'`
success: Secure Pages is configured to force redirect HTTPS.
failure: Secure Pages is not configured to force redirect HTTPS.

key.description: The name of the variable to check.
